graph manipulations

The graph manipulations panel customisea the way Graph is build and presented. It also alows to operate on graph and to modify the way it behaves.

A single-click on a vertex or an edge will show its properties and available actions.

  • Actions:
    • Cluster by group type: Create clusters of vertexes according their type. Unless modified by stylesheet, those clusters are represented by a star.
    • Cluster by group size: Create clusters of vertexes according the size of the connected group.
    • Expand all clusters: Expand all collapsed clusters.
    • Show all edges: Show all edges existing between visible vertexes.
  • Choices:
    • hierarchical: Arrange vertexes in a hiararchy.
      • up/lr: Organize hierarchy up-down or left-right.
      • size/hierarchy: Organize hierarchy according number of neighbours or by structure.
    • live: Organize graph automatically after each interaction
      • clusterize: and clusterize automatically.
    • zoom cluster: Cluster while zooming out.
      • stabilize: and quckly stabilize when zooming.
    • get children: Expand to children on double-click.
    • get parents: Expand to parents on double-click.
    • remove old: Show only new (expanded) vertexes (remove old vertexes) on double-click.
  • Filter: Shown only vertexes with label satisfying specified filter (as a substrich match).
